data.name: Planning, Preparing and Reacting to Systemic Risks' with Ashu Suyash (Managing Director & CEO, CRISIL)
data.summary: Webinar on the topic of 'Planning, Preparing and Reacting to Systemic Risks' with Ashu Suyash (Managing Director & CEO, CRISIL), moderated by TCM Sundaram (Co-Founder & Managing Director at Chiratae Ventures)
